name: single year_offset with rate_type
description: Test case for single year_offset with rate_type
expected_query: with "base_years" as (SELECT unnest(ARRAY[2020,2021,2022,2023,2024]) as year), "player_years" as (SELECT DISTINCT player.pid, base_years.year FROM player CROSS JOIN base_years WHERE player.pos IN ('RB')), "t1dbf22c1937bec7c71654579572c42ca" as (select "player_gamelogs"."pid", count(*) as "rate_type_total_count", array_agg(distinct player_gamelogs.tm) as teams, "nfl_games"."year" from "player_gamelogs" left join "nfl_games" on "nfl_games"."esbid" = "player_gamelogs"."esbid" where "nfl_games"."seas_type" in ('REG') and "player_gamelogs"."active" = true and "nfl_games"."year" in (2020, 2021, 2022, 2023) group by "nfl_games"."year", "player_gamelogs"."pid"), "t73744802b0ac3caa4590c0b0bf651d15" as (select "player_gamelogs"."pid", count(*) as "rate_type_total_count", array_agg(distinct player_gamelogs.tm) as teams, "nfl_games"."year" from "player_gamelogs" left join "nfl_games" on "nfl_games"."esbid" = "player_gamelogs"."esbid" where "nfl_games"."seas_type" in ('REG') and "player_gamelogs"."active" = true and "nfl_games"."year" in (2020, 2021, 2022, 2023, 2024) group by "nfl_games"."year", "player_gamelogs"."pid"), "tcccc004f6f0fc05eea9a8ba37b96747d" as (select COALESCE(bc_pid, trg_pid) as pid, "nfl_plays"."year", ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN nfl_plays.ydl_100 <= 20 AND bc_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1.30 WHEN nfl_plays.ydl_100 <= 20 AND trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 2.25 WHEN nfl_plays.ydl_100 > 20 AND bc_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 0.48 WHEN nfl_plays.ydl_100 > 20 AND trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1.43 ELSE 0 END), 2) as weighted_opportunity_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2020, 2021, 2022, 2023) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by "nfl_plays"."year", COALESCE(bc_pid, trg_pid)), "t56a813af34d67ebf2a77b259bf879c1f" as (with "filtered_plays" as (select "nfl_plays"."bc_pid", "nfl_plays"."psr_pid", "nfl_plays"."trg_pid", "nfl_plays"."player_fuml_pid", "nfl_plays"."week", "nfl_plays"."seas_type", "nfl_plays"."year", "nfl_plays"."rush_yds", "nfl_plays"."rush_td", "nfl_plays"."pass_yds", "nfl_plays"."pass_td", "nfl_plays"."recv_yds", "nfl_plays"."comp", "nfl_plays"."int", "nfl_plays"."first_down", "nfl_plays"."play_type", "nfl_plays"."fuml" from "nfl_plays" where "nfl_plays"."play_type" not in ('NOPL') and ("nfl_plays"."bc_pid" is not null or "nfl_plays"."psr_pid" is not null or "nfl_plays"."trg_pid" is not null or "nfl_plays"."player_fuml_pid" is not null) and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2020, 2021, 2022, 2023) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG')) select "pid", SUM(fantasy_points_from_plays) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from (select * from (select "bc_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(rush_yds, 0) * 0.1 + COALESCE(rush_td::int, 0) * 6), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "bc_pid" is not null group by "bc_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "bc_stats" union all select * from (select "psr_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(pass_yds, 0) * 0.04 + COALESCE(pass_td::int, 0) * 4 + COALESCE("int"::int, 0) * -1), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "psr_pid" is not null group by "psr_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "psr_stats" union all select * from (select "trg_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(recv_yds, 0) * 0.1 + COALESCE(pass_td::int, 0) * 6 + COALESCE(comp::int, 0) * 1), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "trg_pid" is not null group by "trg_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "trg_stats" union all select * from (select "player_fuml_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(-1), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "player_fuml_pid" is not null group by "player_fuml_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "fuml_stats") as "combined_stats" group by "pid", "seas_type", "year" having SUM(fantasy_points_from_plays) > 0), "tb866c481a1dc4e716b8dc9dbb1084b06" as (select COALESCE(bc_pid, trg_pid) as pid, "nfl_plays"."year", ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN nfl_plays.ydl_100 <= 20 AND bc_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1.30 WHEN nfl_plays.ydl_100 <= 20 AND trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 2.25 WHEN nfl_plays.ydl_100 > 20 AND bc_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 0.48 WHEN nfl_plays.ydl_100 > 20 AND trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1.43 ELSE 0 END), 2) as weighted_opportunity_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2020, 2021, 2022, 2023, 2024) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by "nfl_plays"."year", COALESCE(bc_pid, trg_pid)), "tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4" as (with "filtered_plays" as (select "nfl_plays"."bc_pid", "nfl_plays"."psr_pid", "nfl_plays"."trg_pid", "nfl_plays"."player_fuml_pid", "nfl_plays"."week", "nfl_plays"."seas_type", "nfl_plays"."year", "nfl_plays"."rush_yds", "nfl_plays"."rush_td", "nfl_plays"."pass_yds", "nfl_plays"."pass_td", "nfl_plays"."recv_yds", "nfl_plays"."comp", "nfl_plays"."int", "nfl_plays"."first_down", "nfl_plays"."play_type", "nfl_plays"."fuml" from "nfl_plays" where "nfl_plays"."play_type" not in ('NOPL') and ("nfl_plays"."bc_pid" is not null or "nfl_plays"."psr_pid" is not null or "nfl_plays"."trg_pid" is not null or "nfl_plays"."player_fuml_pid" is not null) and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2020, 2021, 2022, 2023, 2024) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG')) select "pid", SUM(fantasy_points_from_plays) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from (select * from (select "bc_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(rush_yds, 0) * 0.1 + COALESCE(rush_td::int, 0) * 6), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "bc_pid" is not null group by "bc_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "bc_stats" union all select * from (select "psr_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(pass_yds, 0) * 0.04 + COALESCE(pass_td::int, 0) * 4 + COALESCE("int"::int, 0) * -1), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "psr_pid" is not null group by "psr_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "psr_stats" union all select * from (select "trg_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(recv_yds, 0) * 0.1 + COALESCE(pass_td::int, 0) * 6 + COALESCE(comp::int, 0) * 1), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "trg_pid" is not null group by "trg_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "trg_stats" union all select * from (select "player_fuml_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(-1), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "player_fuml_pid" is not null group by "player_fuml_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "fuml_stats") as "combined_stats" group by "pid", "seas_type", "year" having SUM(fantasy_points_from_plays) > 0) select "tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, CASE WHEN rosters_players.slot = 13 THEN 'injured_reserve' WHEN rosters_players.slot = 12 THEN 'practice_squad' WHEN rosters_players.slot IS NULL THEN 'free_agent' ELSE 'active_roster' END AS player_league_roster_status, rosters_players.slot, rosters_players.tid, rosters_players.tag, "te70f12f316e28f29e682d081b42501b8"."v" AS "player_keeptradecut_value_0", CAST(tcccc004f6f0fc05eea9a8ba37b96747d.weighted_opportunity_from_plays AS DECIMAL) / NULLIF(CAST(t1dbf22c1937bec7c71654579572c42ca.rate_type_total_count AS DECIMAL), 0) AS "weighted_opportunity_from_plays_0", CAST(t56a813af34d67ebf2a77b259bf879c1f.fantasy_points_from_plays AS DECIMAL) / NULLIF(CAST(t1dbf22c1937bec7c71654579572c42ca.rate_type_total_count AS DECIMAL), 0) AS "fantasy_points_from_plays_0", CAST(tb866c481a1dc4e716b8dc9dbb1084b06.weighted_opportunity_from_plays AS DECIMAL) / NULLIF(CAST(t73744802b0ac3caa4590c0b0bf651d15.rate_type_total_count AS DECIMAL), 0) AS "weighted_opportunity_from_plays_1", CAST(tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4.fantasy_points_from_plays AS DECIMAL) / NULLIF(CAST(t73744802b0ac3caa4590c0b0bf651d15.rate_type_total_count AS DECIMAL), 0) AS "fantasy_points_from_plays_1", "tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4"."year", "player"."pos" from "tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4" inner join "player" on "player"."pid" = "tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4"."pid" left join "t1dbf22c1937bec7c71654579572c42ca" on "t1dbf22c1937bec7c71654579572c42ca"."pid" = "tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4"."pid" and "t1dbf22c1937bec7c71654579572c42ca"."year" = "tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4"."year" left join "t73744802b0ac3caa4590c0b0bf651d15" on "t73744802b0ac3caa4590c0b0bf651d15"."pid" = "tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4"."pid" and t73744802b0ac3caa4590c0b0bf651d15.year = tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4.year + 1 left join "rosters_players" on "rosters_players"."pid" = "tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4"."pid" and "rosters_players"."year" = 2025 and "rosters_players"."week" = ${Math.min(constants.current_season.week, constants.current_season.finalWeek)} and "rosters_players"."lid" = 1 left join "opening_days" on "opening_days"."year" = "tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4"."year" left join "keeptradecut_rankings" as "te70f12f316e28f29e682d081b42501b8" on "te70f12f316e28f29e682d081b42501b8"."pid" = "tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4"."pid" and "te70f12f316e28f29e682d081b42501b8"."qb" = 2 and "te70f12f316e28f29e682d081b42501b8"."type" = 1 and "te70f12f316e28f29e682d081b42501b8"."d" = EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (date_trunc('day', opening_days.opening_day) + interval '0 year'))::integer and opening_days.year = (tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4.year) left join "tcccc004f6f0fc05eea9a8ba37b96747d" on "tcccc004f6f0fc05eea9a8ba37b96747d"."pid" = "tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4"."pid" and tcccc004f6f0fc05eea9a8ba37b96747d.year = "tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4"."pid" and t56a813af34d67ebf2a77b259bf879c1f.year = tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4.year and t56a813af34d67ebf2a77b259bf879c1f.year IN (2020,2021,2022,2023) left join "tb866c481a1dc4e716b8dc9dbb1084b06" on "tb866c481a1dc4e716b8dc9dbb1084b06"."pid" = "tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4"."pid" and tb866c481a1dc4e716b8dc9dbb1084b06.year = tea092c8dd8f02b7419fb1d43f39648e4.year + 1 where player.pos IN ('RB') group by player.fname, player.lname, rosters_players.slot, rosters_players.tid, rosters_players.tag, "te70f12f316e28f29e682d081b42501b8"."v", "tcccc004f6f0fc05eea9a8ba37b96747d"."weighted_opportunity_from_plays", t1dbf22c1937bec7c71654579572c42ca.rate_type_total_count,
